}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[Broadcom BCM94360CSAX]] wireless module is used by some [[Apple]] devices. *[https://ru.ifixit.com/Teardown/MacBook+Pro+15-Inch+Retina+Display+Late+2013+Teardown/18696 ''Apple MacBook Pro 15" Retina Display (Late 2013) Teardown'' on '''iFixit'''] <small> :[[Broadcom]] BCM4360 - AirPort card (5GHz band, 1.3Gbps) :[[Broadcom]] BCM20702 - Single-chip Bluetooth 4.0 SoC :[[Skyworks]] SE5516 Dual-band 802.11abgn/ac WLAN FEM</small>
:There are some revisions with the new BCM20703A1 chip inside. :This chip supports Bluetooth 4.2
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://applelife.ru/threads/zapuskaem-kombo-moduli-wi-fi-bluetooth-ot-apple-na-obychnom-kompjutere.39681/page-3#post-367183 ''Broadcom BCM94360CS'' on '''AppleLife''' forums] :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS]] - MacBook Pro, 3x ant., MIMO 3x3 :[[Broadcom BCM94360CS2]] - MacBook Air, 2x ant., MIMO 2x2 :[[Broadcom BCM94360CD]] - iMac, 3x ant. + 1x ant. BT, MIMO 3x3 *[[User:Skvo|''Skvo'']]: [http://www.tonymacx86.com/general-hardware-discussion/99327-could-next-wlan-bluetooth-combo-card-2013-macbooks.html ''Pinout of the proprietary connector used'' on '''TonyMACx86''' forums]
